name: Fangs Out 2
summary: In this early 3D vector shooter by Kenta Cho (ABA), you pilot a space fighter battling increasingly challenging waves of enemy ships. The game uses flight-sim controls, multiple view modes, and simplified physics simulation, much like earlier influences such as Star Luster. You have both lasers and lock-on missiles for eliminating all 12 types of enemies. Protect your comrades, take down those cruisers, and aim for the highest scores!
